author: miss_bc123
title: 5* superb stay at the Montcalm - excellent boutique hotel
text:
Our stay at the Montcalm Marble arch last weekend was nothing short of fantastic! Every little detail was thought through, the hotel is fabulous and the team are dedicated to making your stay memorable.
We were upgraded to a suite and the team could not do enough to help us celebrate a special occaision. have stayed in many 5* hotels around the world and this is by far one of the best! certainly the best in London for a wonderful, boutique and personalised experience.
Will be back again soon! Thanks to Izabela and the team for making this so special
Room Tip: Amazing boutique experience See more room tips
